trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Levittown
There were no other sightings in Levittown on or around November 19th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsNot sure if this is considered UFO. My daughter, her girlfriend and I were driving home from Trenton NJ on Rte 1 going South, while looking out the driver side window and left front quarter of the windsheild we saw a stream of lights coming from the sky towards the ground. It looked like the Northern lights but without color. There was 6-8 streams of them they would fade and become bright. I saw it first but did not mention it to my daughter and then she said "mom, what is that?". We watched it for about 10-15 minutes as we drove to drop off her girlfriend. We all had the same thought wow thats strange Northlights here. Then my daughter said maybe it was a UFO or aliens. Then we found out that there was all these sightings in the same area in the last year. Again, not sure if this is considered a UFO, but I have never in my 40+ years have seen lights like these in this area. We tried to take photos on my cell phone but was unable too it would not show up.
